scripts.name: Core Setup
scripts.description: Complete system setup automation - installs essential software, removes bloatware, and configures system settings. Select options below.

parameters.name: InstallBaseApps
parameters.label: Install Base Applications
parameters.description: Install Firefox, Chrome, and Adobe Reader

parameters.name: InstallOptionalApps
parameters.label: Install Optional Apps
parameters.description: Install SonicWall NetExtender and PowerShell 7

parameters.name: InstallOffice365
parameters.label: Install Microsoft 365
parameters.description: Install Microsoft 365 (WARNING: Large download, may take a long time)

parameters.name: InstallDevApps
parameters.label: Install Developer Tools
parameters.description: Install Git, VSCode, GitHub Desktop, Oh My Posh, and NVM

parameters.name: UninstallWindowsApps
parameters.label: Remove Windows Bloatware
parameters.description: Uninstall Xbox, LinkedIn, Spotify, and other pre-installed apps

parameters.name: UninstallDellApps
parameters.label: Remove Dell Applications
parameters.description: Uninstall Dell SupportAssist, Dell Update, and other Dell software

parameters.name: UninstallHPApps
parameters.label: Remove HP Applications
parameters.description: Uninstall HP Support Assistant, HP Wolf Security, and other HP software

parameters.name: UninstallLenovoApps
parameters.label: Remove Lenovo Applications
parameters.description: Uninstall Lenovo Vantage and other Lenovo software

parameters.name: RunUpdates
parameters.label: Update All Applications
parameters.description: Run winget update to update all installed applications

parameters.name: AdjustPowerSettings
parameters.label: Optimize Power Settings
parameters.description: Configure for maximum performance (disable sleep, hibernation, etc.)

parameters.name: EnablePublicDiscovery
parameters.label: Enable Network Discovery
parameters.description: Enable network discovery and file sharing on public networks

parameters.name: EnableRemoteDesktop
parameters.label: Enable Remote Access
parameters.description: Enable Remote Desktop and install TightVNC

parameters.name: RemoveNewOutlook
parameters.label: Block New Outlook
parameters.description: Remove and block the new Outlook app from being installed

scripts.name: Gather DNS Info
scripts.description: Retrieves registrar, DNS, A record, MX, SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records for one or more domains.

parameters.name: Domains
parameters.label: Domain Names
parameters.description: Domain name(s) to query (comma-separated for multiple)

parameters.name: DomainListFile
parameters.label: Domain List File
parameters.description: Optional: Path to file containing domain names (one per line)

parameters.name: ExportCsv
parameters.label: Export to CSV
parameters.description: Optional: Path to export results as CSV

parameters.name: VerboseOutput
parameters.label: Verbose Output
parameters.description: Enable verbose output for debugging

scripts.name: New User
scripts.description: User account creation tool for Active Directory domain environments. Creates new users with proper group memberships and settings.

parameters.name: FirstName
parameters.label: First Name
parameters.description: User's first name

parameters.name: LastName
parameters.label: Last Name
parameters.description: User's last name

parameters.name: Username
parameters.label: Username
parameters.description: Active Directory username

parameters.name: Email
parameters.label: Email Address
parameters.description: User's email address

parameters.name: Department
parameters.label: Department
parameters.description: User's department

scripts.name: GPO Gather
scripts.description: Collects and exports Group Policy Object information from Active Directory domain for analysis and documentation.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.label: Domain Name
parameters.description: Active Directory domain name

parameters.name: OutputPath
parameters.label: Output Path
parameters.description: Directory to save GPO reports

parameters.name: ReportFormat
parameters.label: Report Format
parameters.description: Output report format

scripts.name: Get Patch Health
scripts.description: Analyzes Windows Update status and patch compliance. Reports on installed updates, missing patches, and update history.

parameters.name: ComputerName
parameters.label: Computer Name
parameters.description: Target computer name or IP address

parameters.name: DaysBack
parameters.label: Days to Look Back
parameters.description: Number of days of patch history to retrieve

parameters.name: ExportToCSV
parameters.label: Export to CSV
parameters.description: Export results to CSV file

scripts.name: Gather Network Data
scripts.description: Comprehensive network diagnostic data collection including IP configuration, routing tables, network adapters, and connectivity tests.

parameters.name: ComputerName
parameters.label: Computer Name
parameters.description: Target computer name or IP address

parameters.name: OutputPath
parameters.label: Output Path
parameters.description: Directory to save network data output

parameters.name: IncludeTraceRoute
parameters.label: Include Trace Route
parameters.description: Include trace route tests to common destinations

scripts.name: Gather Computer Info
scripts.description: Collects comprehensive system information including hardware specs, OS details, installed software, and system configuration.

parameters.name: ComputerName
parameters.label: Computer Name
parameters.description: Target computer name or IP address

parameters.name: OutputPath
parameters.label: Output Path
parameters.description: Directory to save computer information output

parameters.name: IncludeSoftware
parameters.label: Include Installed Software
parameters.description: Include list of installed software

scripts.name: Disable Shadow Copy on C
scripts.description: Disables and clears Volume Shadow Copy service on C: drive. Used for troubleshooting or freeing up disk space. USE WITH CAUTION.

parameters.name: Confirm
parameters.label: I understand this will delete all shadow copies
parameters.description: Confirmation required - this action cannot be undone

parameters.name: DisableVSS
parameters.label: Disable VSS Service
parameters.description: Also disable the Volume Shadow Copy service

scripts.name: Clear Windows Update Cache
scripts.description: Clears Windows Update cache and temporary files. Stops Windows Update services, removes cached files from SoftwareDistribution and catroot2, then restarts services. USE WITH CAUTION.

scripts.name: Core Fixes
scripts.description: Checks for issues in core tools and attempts to fix them. Updates winget and other system tools. USE WITH CAUTION.

parameters.name: RunCommonFixes
parameters.label: Run Common Fixes
parameters.description: Automatically run common fixes (IE Reset, DISM, SFC) without prompting

parameters.name: ResetOfficeActivation
parameters.label: Reset Office Activation
parameters.description: Run SARA tool to reset Office activation

parameters.name: RepairOffice365
parameters.label: Repair Office 365
parameters.description: Run Office 365 repair

parameters.name: RepairAdobeReader
parameters.label: Repair Adobe Reader
parameters.description: Attempt to repair Adobe Reader

parameters.name: RemoveNewOutlook
parameters.label: Remove New Outlook
parameters.description: Remove and block the new Outlook app

scripts.name: Check Cloudflare Connector Versions
scripts.description: Checks Cloudflare tunnel connector versions and identifies outdated tunnels. Requires Cloudflare API credentials. Can use .env file or parameters.

parameters.name: AuthEmail
parameters.label: Cloudflare Auth Email
parameters.description: Cloudflare account email (leave blank to use .env file)

parameters.name: AuthKey
parameters.label: Cloudflare API Key
parameters.description: Cloudflare API key (leave blank to use .env file) - WARNING: Will be visible on screen

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.label: Cloudflare Account ID
parameters.description: Cloudflare account ID (leave blank to use .env file)

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.label: Cloudflare Zone ID
parameters.description: Cloudflare zone ID (optional, currently not used by script)

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.label: Expected Connector Version
parameters.description: Expected/current connector version to compare against (leave blank to use .env file)

parameters.name: OutputLocation
parameters.label: Output Location
parameters.description: Output location for data export (optional, currently not used by script)

parameters.name: More
parameters.label: Show Detailed Output
parameters.description: Show detailed tunnel information grouped by status

scripts.name: Windows Update Security
scripts.description: Configure Windows Update to recommended security settings. Select which settings to apply below. Based on ChrisTitusTech's WinUtil.

parameters.name: DisableDriverUpdates
parameters.label: Disable Driver Updates
parameters.description: Prevent Windows from automatically downloading and installing driver updates

parameters.name: DisableAutoRestart
parameters.label: Disable Automatic Restart
parameters.description: Prevent Windows from automatically restarting after updates while users are logged on

parameters.name: DeferFeatureUpdates
parameters.label: Defer Feature Updates (365 days)
parameters.description: Delay major Windows feature updates for one year

parameters.name: DeferQualityUpdates
parameters.label: Defer Quality Updates (4 days)
parameters.description: Delay security and quality updates for 4 days
